    Activity for configuring additional options for an event, such as date, attendee limits, ticket price, geolocation, and notifications.
    EntrantListActivity
    EntrantListActivity displays and manages different entrant lists for an event, such as waiting list, selected list, and cancelled list.
    EventEditActivity
    EventEditActivity allows users to edit the poster image for an event.
    EventLandingPageOrganizerActivity
    EventLandingPageOrganizerActivity displays event details for organizers and provides options to view entrants, generate QR codes, and access additional event settings.

    EventLandingPageUserActivity displays event details and allows the user to join or leave the event.

    EventStatusFragment displays a list of events created by the user.

    FacilityCreateActivity allows users to create a new facility by entering its name and description.
    FacilityEditActivity
    FacilityEditActivity allows users to edit the name and description of a facility.
    FacilityLandingPageActivity
    FacilityLandingPageActivity displays information about a facility including its name and description.
    FacilityListActivity
    FacilityListActivity displays a list of facilities and allows users to add new facilities.
    LocationActivity
    LocationActivity displays the locations of participants in an event on a map.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity handles user login by checking if a user exists in Firebase Firestore based on the device ID.
    NotificationActivity
    Activity for displaying notifications to the user in a RecyclerView.
    ProfileActivity
    Activity for managing user profiles.
    ProfileActivity.AdminCallback
    Callback interface for determining admin status.

    Activity for generating and managing QR codes for event organizers.
    QRUserActivity
    Custom activity for QR code scanning using the ZXing library.
    SendNotificationOverlay
    Dialog fragment for sending notifications to users.
    SignUpActivity
    Activity class for user sign-up functionality.
    SplashScreenActivity
    Activity class for displaying a splash screen with animations and handling delayed transitions.
    YourEventsFragment
    Fragment class for displaying the user's events in a RecyclerView.
